review_text: I have used these timers since February (now April) on a daily basis. Sometimes the little mechanical/plastic tabs do not turn the lights on or off. It misses about once per week. If you need your timer to reliably work, order a digital timer that is not mechanically based.
summary: Doesn't always turn on or off
product_name: Intermatic TN311C 120 Volt Heavy Duty Grounded Timer
